title: Great Basin National Park: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices         2013 Great Basin National Park Staff   Great Basin National Park is operated year round by a core staff of approximately 30 employees. Another 30 seasonal employees supplement that number during the busy summer months.  All employees function in one of five divisions.  Â    Park Management and Administration Superintendent: Steve Mietz (775) 234-7502  Administrative Officer: Anita Hansen (775) 234-7501  Interpretation Chief of Interpretation: Nichole Andler (775) 234-7521  Resource and Visitor Protection Chief Ranger: Tammie Henderson (775) 234-7580  Resource Management Resource Manager: Tod Williams (775) 234-7560  Maintenance Facility Manager: Glen Dearden (775) 234-7530
